invention-title: New energy hydrogen fuel cell sectional type hydrogen storage device and use method thereof
一种新能源的氢燃料电池分段式储氢装置及其使用方法

abstract.p: The invention provides a new-energy hydrogen fuel cell sectional type hydrogen storage device and a use method thereof, relates to the field of hydrogen storage devices, and aims to solve the problems that when an existing hydrogen fuel cell hydrogen storage device is used, no sectional type buffer liquid hydrogen structure exists, and when a vehicle encounters collision, the vehicle cannot be damaged. The internal liquid hydrogen vibration device comprises a main body, the main body is a hydrogen storage device body, the two ends of the main body are of arc-shaped structures, and two fixing pieces are fixed to the upper end and the lower end of the outer side of the main body. When a vehicle vibrates or impacts, liquid hydrogen collides in the main body, liquid nitrogen makes contact with the connecting piece and the stress piece, the connecting piece can slightly change the flowing direction of the liquid hydrogen, the flow speed of the liquid hydrogen can be preliminarily reduced, and when the liquid hydrogen makes contact with the stress piece, due to the fact that the stress piece is of an inclined structure, the rotating piece rotates; the multiple stress pieces can rotate, liquid hydrogen collision is controlled, the circulation speed of the liquid hydrogen is reduced, the liquid hydrogen is more stable, and the influence on the main body is reduced.

本发明提供一种新能源的氢燃料电池分段式储氢装置及其使用方法，涉及储氢装置领域，以解决现有的氢燃料电池储氢装置在使用的时候，没有分段式缓冲液氢的结构，车辆遇到冲撞时，内部液氢振动容易对储氢装置内部产生强烈冲撞的问题，包括主体；所述主体为储氢装置本体，且主体的两端为弧形结构，主体的外侧上下两端固定有两个固定件。车辆振动或撞击的时候，液氢在主体的内部产生冲撞，液氮与连接件以及受力件接触，连接件可以轻微改变液氢流通方向，使液氢可以初步减少流速，液氢与受力件接触的时候，由于受力件为倾斜状结构，使旋转件旋转，使得多个受力件可以旋转，控制液氢冲撞，减少其流通速度，使其更加稳定，减少对主体产生的影响。
